txt.en: '[placeholder], my friend, you have done a great service for the Elves, and I would ask one more favour of you. Go to Echad Dúnann and speak with Palanaer. He should know of Saruman's encroachment upon the ruins of Eregion.\n\n'Echad Dúnann lies to the south-east, not far from the gates of Moria called the Doors of Durin. Go, and may the stars shine upon your road.'

'Welcome, [placeholder]. You bring word from Ladenthir? It troubles me that Saruman's forces have moved so far north, and that he dares to despoil the ancient ruins of our kinsmen.\n\n'Though your news is dire, I thank you for it, for it will allow us to prepare a defence.'
'Go now to Echad Dúnann...Palanaer should know of Saruman's encroachment.'
Ladenthir does not know how far the reach of Saruman has gone, but his touch has been felt in Eregion.
Talk to Palanaer at Echad Dúnann
Palanaer is at Echad Dúnann, south-east of Echad Eregion.\n\nLadenthir has asked you to bear news of Saruman's encroachment upon Eregion to Palanaer, another of the scouts of Rivendell.
